mapper.sql: id, user_id, org_id, flow_time, flow_address_province, flow_address_city, flow_address_area, flow_address_detail
mapper.insert: insert into flow_party (id, user_id, org_id, flow_time, reason, flow_address_province, flow_address_city, flow_address_area, flow_address_detail) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flowTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{flowAddressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowAddressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowAddressArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into flow_party
id,
user_id,
org_id,
flow_time,
reason,
flow_address_province,
flow_address_city,
flow_address_area,
flow_address_detail,

mapper.update:
update flow_party
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flow_time = #{flowTime,jdbcType=INTEGER},
reason = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
flow_address_province = #{flowAddressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_address_city = #{flowAddressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_address_area = #{flowAddressArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
flow_address_detail = #{flowAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update flow_party set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, org_id = #{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flow_time = #{flowTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, flow_address_province = #{flowAddressProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_address_city = #{flowAddressCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_address_area = #{flowAddressArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flow_address_detail = #{flowAddressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select bui.base_user_id userId, bui.name name, bui.sex sex, nt.name nation, bui.mobile_phone mobilePhone, pui.type partyType, pui.status partyStatus, _oi.org_info_name flowOrgInfoName, fp.reason reason, fp.flow_time flowTime, fp.id id, fp.flow_address_province flowAddressProvince, fp.flow_address_city flowAddressCity, fp.flow_address_area flowAddressArea, fp.flow_address_detail flowAddressDetail from flow_party fp inner join base_user_info bui on fp.user_id = bui.base_user_id inner join party_user_info pui on fp.user_id = pui.party_user_id left join nation_type nt on bui.nation = nt.nt_id left join organization_information _oi on fp.org_id = _oi.org_info_id where 1 = 1 and fp.user_id = #{userId}
and bui.name = #{name}
